title: Riot support not responding
body: So i sent a ticket 5 days ago and I'm still waiting.Usually they respond in 1,2 days.All i got was the "How'd we do?" survey 3 days ago.

replies.body: That's weird!  A survey would suggest that the ticket was closed after some correspondence.  Was it an account recovery ticket?  If so, our account team may ask you to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) instead of a normal ticket to make sure it gets to the right hands.  Otherwise, let me know your ticket number and I'll check out what happened!
